description.default: A tool for site admins to make requests for changes that require a SPO admin or Flow/PowerShell.

properties.MaxStorageDescription: The max threshold has been met.
properties.ReportsDocSearchFileExt: csv doc docx dot dotx pdf pot potx pps ppsx ppt pptx txt xls xlsx xlt xltx
properties.SitePropCommentsOnSitePagesDisabledDescr: If true, comments on modern site pages will be disabled.
properties.SitePropContainsAppCatalogDescription: If true, the SPFx app catalog is available for this site collection.
properties.SitePropCustomScriptsEnabledDescription: If true, custom scripts feature is enabled on the site collection. When enabled, this feature will automatically be reverted after 24 hours.
properties.SitePropDisableCompanyWideSharingLinksDe: If true, it will limit who you can share content with.
properties.SitePropHubSiteDescription: If true, this is the top level hub site.
properties.SitePropHubSiteConnectedDescription: If true, the site is connected to a hub site.
properties.SitePropIncreaseStorageDescription: Enable this switch to request additional storage space.
properties.SitePropLockStateDescription:
• Unlock: To unlock the site and make it available to users.
  • Read Only: To prevent users from adding/updating/deleting content.
  • No Access To prevent users from accessing the site and its content. A helpdesk ticket will be required in order to unlock the site.
properties.SitePropShareByEmailEnabledDescription: If true, guest access will be enabled on this site collection.
properties.SitePropSocialBarOnSitePagesDisabledDesc: If true, the social bar to like/comment/views/bookmarking will be removed from the site pages.
properties.SitePropSocialBarOnSitePagesDisabledLabe: Social Bar On Site Pages Disabled:
properties.SitePropStorageUsedDescription: The total size of the site collection.
properties.WebPropCommentsOnSitePagesDisabledDescri: If true, it will hide the comments on the site pages.
properties.WebPropExcludeFromOfflineClientDescripti: If true, content from this site collection will be excluded from search.
properties.WebPropSearchPropertyDescription: The custom property to set for search.
properties.WebPropSearchScopeDescription: The search scope for the site to target. Default is 'Site'.
